raw_response: {"answer_index": 2, "answer_text": "Projection", "confidence": 10, "reasoning": "Projection is a defense mechanism in which an individual attributes their own unacceptable thoughts or feelings to someone else. In this scenario, the man is experiencing doubts about his relationship and has been flirting with co-workers. Instead of acknowledging his own behavior, he accuses his wife of being unfaithful, which is classic projection."}
